attributes.action: Organ donation promotion needed by supermarkets and companies to save many lives
attributes.additional_details:
UK government regulate insurance companies and supermarkets to promote organ donation when registering new customers this would save many lives.

We call on the government to ensure all life that can be saved is saved and all preventable mortality is avoided through promotion.

By donating your organs after you die, you will help save and transform the lives of desperately ill people.

Government, companies and supermarkets are standing by as many people die now in this developed country, shame.

We do not want to see another death of someone waiting on the transplant waiting list in UK.

It breaks your human rights to life , family life  and having a good life if you are not having essential life saving promotion from supermarkets and insurance companies.

 Schemes such as DVLA and passport organ donation tick boxes have saved 100`s of 1000`s of lives.

Please sign this e-petition and save many lives
